TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecuritySafeCriticalAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecuritySafeCriticalAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SecuritySafeCriticalAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=false, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 將類型或成員識別為安全性關鍵的，且可由透明程式碼安全地存取。

span.span: Identifies types or members as security-critical and safely accessible by transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型或成員會標示屬性可由部分信任的類型和成員存取。Types or members that are marked with the attribute can be accessed by partially trusted types and members. 這些部分信任的類型和成員可以使用標記之任何組件內或(APTCA) 屬性，或者它們是部分受信任其他原因，例如部分信任正在載入。These partially trusted types and members can be within any assembly that is marked with the or (APTCA) attribute, or they are partially trusted for other reasons, such as being loaded into partial trust. 程式碼標示為必須受到嚴密的安全性稽核，以確保能安全地執行環境中安全地使用。Code that is marked with the must be subject to a rigorous security audit to ensure that it can be used safely in a secure execution environment. 安全性安全關鍵程式碼必須驗證呼叫端的權限，以判斷它們是否具有程式碼所使用的受保護的資源的存取權限。Security-safe-critical code must validate the permissions of callers to determine whether they have authority to access protected resources used by the code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
